subject: feat(pwa): add generated app icons for all PWA sizes
body:
Green rounded-square icon with white coin and emerald "B" letter,
generated via pure Python script (no external image deps needed).

Files: pwa-512x512.png, pwa-192x192.png, apple-touch-icon.png,
favicon.ico, icon.svg (reference), scripts/generate-icons.py

Tags: pwa, icons, assets
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: mvp-implementation
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01MpkgALaDQ3xJsXyhFZbApL
title: add generated app icons for all PWA sizes
